await contract.getAllStages('25')
await contract.getAllStages('P001')
await contract.getAllStages('1')
await contract.getAllProductIds()
await contract.getProduct("P001")
await contract.addProduct("P001", "Jaket Biru", "Denim")

const ProductTrace = await ethers.getContractFactory("ProductTrace")
const [owner] = await ethers.getSigners()

await contract.getAllProductIds()

await contract.getProduct("P003")
await contract.getAllDistributors("P003");
await contract.getAllDistributors("P001");
await contract.addDistributor("P001", "Gudang Surabaya");
await contract.getAllStages("P001")
await contract.getProduct("P001")
await contract.addProductionStage("P001", "Cutting")
await contract.addProduct("P002", "Jaket Biru", "Denim")
